import React, { Component } from 'react' import CourseService from '../../Services/courseService' let courseService = new CourseService() export default class CourseItem extends Component { onDeleteCourse = (maKhoaHoc) => { console.log(ma); courseService.deleteCourse(maKhoaHoc).then(res => { console.log("xoa thanh cong"); this.props.deleteCourse(this.props.course.maKhoaHoc) }).catch(err => { console.log(err); }) } render() { let { course } = this.props return (
{course.tenKhoaHoc}
development
